events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position on May 1st. Our team is excited to review your qualifications.
Your application has been categorised under the 'Engineering' cluster, focusing on software development roles that match your skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will reach out to you shortly to discuss the next steps in the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening of your resume and background. Your experience in software engineering looks promising for the role.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for a technical interview next week. We appreciate your enthusiasm.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC. You will receive a calendar invite with the meeting link shortly.
You successfully completed the technical interview. The panel noted your strong problem-solving skills and familiarity with modern development tools.
We have scheduled the HR interview for May 15th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits. Please confirm your availability.
The HR interview was completed and our team enjoyed learning more about your values and career goals. We feel you’re a great fit.
We are pleased to extend you an offer for the software engineer role. Please review the attached details and reach out with any questions.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer package. We’re happy to hear the terms meet your expectations.
You have officially accepted the job offer. We look forward to welcoming you onboard as a valuable member of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started. You will receive access to company systems, orientation schedules, and your mentor assignment soon.
The hiring process is now officially closed with your successful integration into our engineering team. Welcome aboard!
